name: Endless Runner - Week 1
description:
Game made in the "Make a game every week" over at https://github.com/DirectRender/EveryWeek2023

The game uses SSGI & SSR at Epic settings

NVIDIA GPU: ~GTX 1060

AMD GPU: Give me feedback, thanks

RAM: 1GB

OS: Linux, MacOS or Windows (Uses Vulkan & DX11)

Controls: A, D - Left/Right
